item.title: Stocks slip in last day of 2024, but S&P 500 on track for second 20% annual gain in a row: Live updates
item.description: The S&P has surged over 23% this year, on pace for its second consecutive annual gain above 20%.

item.title: Nearly all of Puerto Rico is without power on New Year's Eve
item.description: A blackout hit nearly all of Puerto Rico early Tuesday, leaving more than 1.3 million clients in the dark. It could take up to two days to restore pow...

item.title: Stock market makes it all the way through 2024 without a major correction
item.description: The final session of 2024 is here and it will mark the end of a remarkably smooth year for Wall Street.

item.title: Berkshire Hathaway buys more of internet value play in the last few sessions of 2024
item.description: Berkshire now owns 13.8% of Verisign after scooping up shares consistently throughout this month.

item.title: 'Magnificent 7' stocks responsible for more than half of the S&P 500's 2024 gain
item.description: Despite a focus on the market rally broadening, gains were centered around a small group of megacap tech stocks.
